name: Reserve - Sparkling Sugar Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Blackcurrant (Cassis Berries), Peach Nectar, White Musk..Fragrance Description: Inspired by a wink and smile, this fun and flirty fragrance blends cassis berries and luscious peach nectar with soft pink sugar to create an irresistibly sweet—but not too sweet—scent with a little sass. Ambrette, a natural musk, lingers on the skin for the final touch...About the Bottle: CLEAN RESERVE is a farm-to-fragrance collection crafted with sustainably sourced ingredients and eco-conscious packaging...About the Fragrance: CLEAN RESERVE made the choice to partner with a company that sources sustainable ambrette harvested by farmers in El Salvador to help support education programs and provide a stable source of income for the local farmers and their communities...
ingredients: Ingredients/Ingrédients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance*, Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydroxycitronellal,.Citronellol, Coumarin.*Fragrance Ingredients Greater Than 0.09%: Ethylene Brassylate, Triethyl Citrate, Tetramethyl.Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Dimethylcyclohexylethoxy.Isobutylpropanoate, Isobutyl Methyl Tetrahydropyranol, 1,5,5,9-Tetramethyl-13-.oxatricyclo(8.3.0.0(4,9))tridecane, Methylcyclopentadecenone, Ethyl Hydroxypyrone, Hexyl.Acetate, Ethyl Hydroxypyrone, Hexyl Acetate
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

shades.shade_name: 3.4 oz / 100 ml eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_text: Typically, I’m not big on sweet or warm gourmand (i.e., vanilla) fragrances. My typical daily drivers are LES by Boy Smells, Pear, Inc. by Juliette Has A Gun, and You by Glossier, to give a sense of what I typically reach for. But I actually really liked this! It’s definitely sweet but has a freshness that keeps it from being too cloying. It smells like the color pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love sweet fragrances, but I’m always looking for something light and not overly cloying — CLEAN RESERVE Sparkling Sugar is exactly that! This perfume sparkles with a perfect balance of sweetness and freshness. The initial notes remind me of caramel, but they quickly unfold into a bright, fruity sparkle that lasts throughout the day.  It’s subtle yet noticeable, and I’ve gotten several compliments, especially from friends who also enjoy sweet scents. For me, it’s a versatile choice — great for everyday wear and special occasions. If you love sweet but refined fragrances, Sparkling Sugar is definitely worth trying!  - Product gifted by CLEAN RESERVE (USA).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely think this scent is adorable! It is sophisticated yet fun and flirty at the same time. I really wasn’t sure if I would like it or if it would be too sweet because I love sweet fragrance but some of them are too sweet. I love how this has the perfect balance to it if sweetness and freshness. It is not overpowering and when you first smell it you get that fresh cottony smell and then the sweetness comes through but also that hint of musk in the end really pulls it all together for me. I wasn’t sure if this would last and a did a couple of sprays on my skin and felt like it didn’t want to stick or last the day compared to a few sprays on my clothes and I felt like I could smell it longer. The thing with fragrance is you can’t assume other people can’t smell it or it doesn’t last because nose blindness is real and you just get used to it because I could smell it after I took my clothes off and realized it was still lightly there so I do believe it has lasting power but at the same time wish it lasted longer. I love this travel size because it fits in my purse for on the go if I want to reapply to keep refreshed. If you get headaches from fragrance easy I feel this would be a good choice because it is light but also everyone has different tolerance and I have a high scent tolerance and can go pretty strong so something that is light to me could be strong to someone else but I strongly believe this is a good light scent that won’t give anyone a headache and would recommend giving it a try. I overall though am in love with it and is definitely a scent I want to grab to smell fresh and ready to go.   - Product gifted by CLEAN RESERVE (USA).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sparkling Sugar is an absolute delight! The fragrance is light, refreshing, and beautifully sweet without being overwhelming. It opens with a playful, sugary brightness, reminiscent of sparkling candy, yet it has a sophisticated undertone that feels modern and clean. The scent is versatile—perfect for both day and night wear.  I also appreciate how it pairs perfectly with soft, cozy vibes (just like the blanket in the photo!). It's an uplifting and comforting scent that never fails to make me smile. CLEAN RESERVE truly captured a sparkling essence in this one. Highly recommend for anyone who loves subtle sweetness with a polished edge!

reviews.review_title: A scent that’s perfect for my bubbly personality!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure what’s up with the negative reviews, but I personally loved it! This is the kind of fragrance that is great for any occasion! It has a playful and flirty blend which is a perfect fit for my bubbly personality!  It’s housed in a chic glass spray bottle, so it gives off an elegant kind of feel. When you first spray it, it gives off a scent of sparkling cassis berries that energizes the senses, so it immediately draws you and anyone around you in. The heart of the scent(luscious peach nectar) adds a juicy sweetness that feels both inviting and refreshing, and then it’s perfectly balanced by soft pink sugar. It’s sweet, but in a way that feels light and airy, so its not so strong that it gives you or your peers headaches. As the fragrance develops, a subtle layer of ambrette (a natural musk) adds depth, and in return a warm and inviting base lingers beautifully on the skin. The final touch is a whisper of soft musk that ties everything together. Whether you’re running errands or going on a date, this Sparkling Sugar perfume leaves you feeling sexy and flirty for hours!   I received Clean reserve sparkling sugar perfume for free in exchange for my honest opinion.  #Clean Reserve #CleanAtSephora #perfumereview #perfumelovers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve recently been loving Clean Reserve Sparkling Sugar, a fragrance that perfectly balances sweetness with a touch of freshness. As someone who typically avoids overly sugary scents, this one caught me by surprise in the best way. It’s sweet but not cloying, with a bit of sass to keep it interesting.  NOTES:  • Top: Cassis Berries, Ambrette Seeds  • Middle: Peach Nectar, Jasmine Petals, Pink Sugar  • Dry Down: White Musk, Tonka Bean, Blond Woods  The top notes of cassis berries and ambrette seeds immediately give it a fruity, refreshing start. The heart of peach nectar, jasmine petals, and pink sugar creates a soft, warm sweetness that’s just right. Finally, the dry-down with white musk, tonka bean, and blond woods provides a smooth, comforting base that lingers beautifully.  This perfume is perfect for everyday wear—whether you’re heading to the office or just enjoying a relaxing day. The longevity is impressive, and it leaves a soft, inviting scent that stays with you.  Sparkling Sugar has quickly become a staple in my fragrance rotation, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a light yet sweet scent that’s ideal for daily wear.

The scent is very long lasting and doesn't take but 1 spray which I did like but the musk was a little too strong and after awhile it gave me a headache. Product gifted by CLEAN RESERVE (USA)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance enthusiast, I was so excited to try Clean Reserve’s Sparkling Sugar. At first spray, there’s a burst of bright citrus and a mild sugary sweetness. As it settles, it becomes warmer and softer, with a subtle hint of musk that balances out the sweetness nicely.  A great feature about this perfume is how versatile it is. It’s great for daytime wear, but I’ve found that the cozy notes make it nice for evenings too. The scent lasts roughly 4-5 hours on my skin, and it’s noticeable without being overpowering.  Clean Reserve is also an eco-friendly, vegan, and cruelty-free company which is always a plus in my book. I just love the minimalist, modern bottle design also. The fact that the travel version still has a spray is a thoughtful detail as well.  Overall, If you’re looking for a light, sweet fragrance that’s easy to wear and lifts your mood, Clean Reserve Sparkling Sugar is a great choice. It’s like a little dose of sunshine in a bottle!  #CleanReserve #CleanAtSephora  #perfumereview #perfumelovers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When you hear SPARKLING SUGAR, what comes to your mind? Thank you @cleanreserve and @butterly for selecting me and sending me this rollerball fragrance to try and review in exchange for my honest opinion and feedback on the product itself. First thing first, I was drawn in from the name of this perfume! I love sweet fragrances and I knew this was going to be right up my alley. You’re going to love this brand!! Meet CLEAN RESERVE! They are a A FARM-TO-FRAGRANCE COLLECTION: which means their scents are crafted with the perfumer’s reserve of sustainable ingredients that give back to farmers and their communities. I love that they give back! Now let’s talk about this fragrance itself. This perfume is beyond Fun & Flirty.It is inspired by a wink and smile, this fragrance blends cassis berries and luscious peach nectar with soft pink sugar to create an irresistibly sweet, but not too sweet, scent with a little sass. The fragrance OPENS with sparkling cassis berries layered over a luminous ambrette, a natural musk. WHILE a sassy blend of juicy peach nectar and soft pink sugar creates the illusion of a pink vanilla cloud. DEMURE notes of musk linger on the skin for the FINAL touch of a wink and a smile. I wish you could smell this one through the screen!! #CleanReserve #CleanAtSephora  #perfumereview #perfumelovers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Happy, bright, sweet, fruity, feminine, and overall just a pretty fragrance! This surprisingly reminds me of Clean Reserve Radiant Nectar, especially in the opening. I feel like Sparkling Sugar has more of a Berry peach white sugar scent and Radiant Nectar has more of a pear brown sugar scent. As it dries down I notice a softly musky, warm, and subtle woodsy scent as well. There’s this warm and comfortable feel to it too that’s rather nostalgic for some reason. I get the same thing with Radiant Nectar and B&BW Chasing Fireflies. I would also describe this as a sweet and fruity fragrance for the clean girl aesthetic.  I find this to be just an overall pretty fragrance! Something that’s easy to reach for, uplifting, and inoffensive. Very easy to wear. I love the nostalgic feel of this, it’s somehow comforting because of it. It would work really well for at the office because it is a softer fragrance, but it also lasts really well on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this isn't the best or strongest scent very very light, but it does smell nice with Valentino pink Roma

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the most beautiful, soft scents I have ever smelled. I got this as a free sample and fell in love. I have hundreds of perfumes and this is close to number one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the answer to a fragrance when you’re entering your soft girl era….  it is not too overpowering, but it’s sweet and very pretty and very sexy. I love it. It has that clean aesthetic that every soft girl would love. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So beautiful but it smells almost exactly like Radiant Nectar, just a tiny bit of a lighter scent. I love both, but I prefer Radiant Nectar for its deeper and longer lasting sweetness. After a few hours, Sparkling Sugar fades to a kind of powdery sweetness whereas Radiant Nectar stays juicy and rich. BUT you definitely only need one in your collection. Has a beautiful personal sillage but only lasts around 4 hours. It’s also really similar to Ariana’s God is A Woman which is just a bit fainter. On the other hand, I’ve seen people compare this to Glossier’s You and I can kind of see it after You sits for about 30 mins, but the initial dry down of You is pure dirty laundry on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite perfume scent however it expires extremely fast. My travel size of this began smelling like vinegar within 5 months and my sample size in 2 weeks. I have a full size and I’m holding out on opening it because I do not trust the bottle will last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only but it if you do not want too much projection from it. I work in hospital and cannot wear strong perfumes that project for sake of my patients. This is a nice and sweet smelling one that stays close and personal to you. In fact, any Clean perfumes are personal space perfumes depending on if you like the notes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

I am not sure if there is something wrong with the batches I got or what, but it’s going to be a no from me. Returning immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this fragrance. To start the bottle is gorgeous. looks great on my desk. It has quickly become one of my top go to everyday scents. It smells like a bowl of juicy peaches and berries sprinkled with sweet sugar bottled up, and the warm amber musk comes out when it's warmed up on my skin. It's so good and the longer it sits the better it gets. It doesn't smell identical to radiant nectar to me like others are saying. That scent is more fruity peachy. This one has similar dna but this is alot more juicy from the berries, sweet from the pink sugar and warm from the ambrette musk. They're both good but this is better. I've already purchased the full size and will continue to. I hope they keep this one permanently in their line up. I'm 29 but I feel this can be great for any age and better for spring and summer but ill wear anytime lol. For reference I'm a typical gourmand/sweet scent girl and my favorites include black opium, clean reserve skin, kilian ldbs, kilian princess, dolce and gabbana the only one, etc....hope I could help anyone on the fence. Go for it. You'll love it.

reviews.review_text: Simply divine! Smells like you just stepped out of a luxurious bath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent! It is so fresh and clean with a tad of sweetness. I especially love it layered with Dulce by Rosie Jane. I think I have finally found my signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells nice but nothing even close to sweet or sugary. It’s really a light floral with just a hint of fruitiness. If you like true gourmand scents you may want to skip this one. I wish I had and will now mail back for a return.
I got a sample of this in my Sephora order and it was actually incredible and it stayed all day. I loveeee it, it’s sweet but not too sweet.

This scent equals radiant nectar minus the pear, add peach. It’s pretty but a little redundant imo. If you want a nice peach scent tho, this could fit the bill. Nice fragrance but nothing extraordinary.
I received a rollerball of this as a freebie. It smells exactly like Ariana Grande’s “thank u, next” perfume. So much so that I swatched one on each wrist and they smell identical.

I am absolutely in love with this new scent. It's so captivating that I can't help but keep sniffing my wrist all day long. Although I don't typically enjoy sweet fragrances, this one is an exception - it's perfect for me. It has a similar aroma to Lancome's Miracle or other similar scents, it brings back good memories.
Love this scent - it’s EXACTLY like the (sadly discounted) Prada Candy Gloss. It’s super sweet, with a hint of spice so if you don’t like sweet then it won’t be for you.

Absolutely love this scent profile. Some will say if you have radiant nectar you don’t need this but I disagree. I have radiant nectar, but I find that one more musky. I love them both, but I think I prefer this one for spring/summer. Radiant nectar for fall/winter. Stunning!

reviews.review_title: MY NEW ALL TIME FAVORITE FRAGRANCE!!
reviews.review_text: I’m not one to leave reviews but I have received SOO many dang compliments when wearing this fragrance! It’s creates this beautiful cloud-like effect that lingers on your skin all day (in the best way!) It’s the perfect blend of sweet, musky, fruity deliciousness… yet still somehow elevated. Love love love … highly recommended!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this scent it's not over powering it's just right it's one of my favorite go to everyday scents and I get nice compliments whenever I wear it 😊

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. It’s clean, fresh, and sweet. You could wear this all year, but I’m saving it for the spring. I had been wanting radiant nectar for quite some time, but decided to get this one. It’s just slightly sweeter. I love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have Clean Reserve Radiant Nectar you probably don’t need this new Sparkling Sugar as they smell very similar. On initial spray I really can’t differentiate between the two fragrances- sweet and fruity. On the dry down sparkling sugar is a bit more gourmand, while radiant nectar is a bit more fruity. You can’t go wrong with either, but you don’t need both!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i got this in a sample size and wasn’t too sure if i would like the scent but as soon as i sprayed it on me i loved it! i just bought the full size version and i find that it lasts for up to 4 hours on me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this but I wanted to love it. It does start out sugary, sparkling and peachy, to me. Not too complex. I need to give myself several sprays as it’s relatively light and I like a little more projection. I did a wear test and found that I got about 4 hours of wear in which I would smell a whiff:waft of the scent as I was moving around in normal activities. After about 6-8 hours, I could still smell it on me,  it on,y by bringing my wrist to my nose directly. So, that tells me someone very close (hugging/snuggling) would smell it on you after that time, but not someone at more distance. I am glad I bought , though it was on 20% off, so I feel the value is good. It is a nice, hefty bottle and looks beautiful with my other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: On me, the fragrance description of the product is on point- berries, pear, and sugar that mellow out into a musky but sweet skin scent. If you take gourmand to mean something edible then yes, fresh gourmand fits but it doesn't have the usual dessert like notes that most people associate with gourmand, only a sugary note. I wish it had more musk on the dry down to ground it and make it a little more balanced. It is pretty similar to Radiant Nectar from this line but on me it was sweeter and stronger pear and berries right at the start.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This isn’t my favorite. It doesn’t smell bad but it’s not anything I’ll gravitate towards in my collection. Definitely not gourmand. I will likely be taking it back to exchange for another scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a fruity, sweet smell but I wouldn't really classify it as a gourmand scent. It's a pleasant scentl, however I find it to be a little generic and not unique enough for me to keep, for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a nice soft skin scent. You get a lot of a sweet peach. More like a hot weather/spring fragrance. I’m really disappointed in the longevity of it. After about an hour there’s no trail of it not even on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really enjoyed this scent I did a blind buy and I fell in love. It’s a sweet but fresh scent it’s very different from other scents I own but it’s a 10/10 would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ughhhh. Ill just stick to Skin and Radiant Nectar. This is not my type of scent. Its smells like sugary berries. Its very juvenile smelling I was excited to try it because I love the brand but issa no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really wonderful scent but it’s not gourmand.  I have Radiant Nectar and they are very similar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like a pin-a colada. Radiant nectar is better or skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is nice, but don’t be fooled by the description. This doesn’t really smell like a gourmand, it’s much more fresh and solar smelling.The peach really comes through not so much the sugar, if you want some thing sweet, clean reserve skin is what I would recommend. this one is a lot like radiant nectar. If you have that one, then in my opinion, you don’t really need this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have this and the Radiant Nectar. I love both of them. Initially, they smell similar. But the dry down is completely different on me. This definitely has a stronger musk scent. It is perfect for everyday and still smells great after 6 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The pro is that it smells good. The con is that it smells almost exactly like Radiant Nectar. I asked my mom and sister and they agreed. There is a teeny weeny difference and I can’t put my finger on it, but if you already have Radiant Nectar, then you definitely don’t need this. Even though I can barely tell the difference, I still prefer Radiant Nectar over the 0.000002% difference between the two. I will be returning this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes, but this smells like a Victoria’s Secret Bombshell flanker. Fresh fruity clean girly.  And pretty light/faint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I took a chance and bought this blind and I have to say I was NOT disappointed. It's both fresh and warm at the same time. It does have a hint of peach in it that I am really loving. I love the Skin scent by them and gourmand is my favorite type of scent. I would say this is the best of both worlds both fresh and gourmand and very unoffensive. I am sometimes sensitive to smells and this does not bother me at all and would be good for everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very sweet and pretty! Smells like peach rings and champagne. If you’re a fan of Radiant Nectar, you’re going to love this!
